content:
You have been presented with a list of intents, each with an alphanumeric ID, a topic name, and a description. Within each intent is a list of slots that must be filled for that intent. When I present you with an utterance, you will match that utterance to the intent that is most appropriate, and you will fill in all the slots for that intent. If there is no intent that matches it whatsoever, the intent in your output should be marked "NA" and the same goes for slots. Your output must match the same format of the intent list (a dictionary with a key for the intent and an embedded dictionary of the slots). 

"Make sure to cap my food spending next month to 300 dollars"
